Name: Dangerous Lands - Magic and RPG
About the game: Watch out! You are in Dangerous Lands, where monsters and magic can be found everywhere. These lands are infested with monsters, use potions to recover your health and mana. Always save your game, this game doesn't have auto-save features. Fight with monsters through the entire land. Use your sword and combine with your magic to obliterate all enemies in your way. - Level up your character - Learn new magic to destroy your enemies and increase your power - Fight with lots of different enemies - Get coins to purchase items and equipment that will make your journey easier - Help people by completing a lot of quests
